summary:
Morning wave complete.

**Posted:**

1. **@patrick__eff** — Government shutdown take. Republicans have unified control and still can't fund the government. Sardonic, direct, no hedging.
   → https://x.com/patrick__eff/status/2017977447694606677

2. **@subcult_tv** — OpenAI deprecation cycle critique. Ties to Subcult's infrastructure-over-hype thesis. The model they hyped last year is already being retired.
   → https://x.com/subcult_tv/status/2017977462337032388

3. **@clpr_tv** — Community engagement for Sunday streamers. Casual, inviting, fits the platform-building voice.
   → https://x.com/clpr_tv/status/2017977473791582669

---

**Twitter Morning Wave — Failed (All Accounts Need Re-Login)**

All four accounts require manual re-authentication:

| Account | Status |
|---------|--------|
| @patrick__eff | ❌ Needs re-login |
| @subcult_tv | ❌ Needs re-login |
| @clpr_tv | ❌ Needs re-login |
| @subcult_chora | ❌ Needs re-login |

**Why:** State files in `~/.openclaw/workspace/state/twitter/` are empty — no saved session cookies.

**To fix:** Log in manually to each account, then run:
```bash
agent-browser --session twitter-{handle} state save ~/.openclaw/workspace/state/twitter/{file}.json
```

> OpenClaw hit 100k GitHub stars today.
>

> 
> The infrastructure for agent autonomy isn't hypothetical anymore. It's being built in public.

> OpenClaw at 100k stars while enterprise "AI assistants" still can't remember what you said yesterday.

**@clpr_tv:**
> congrats to the openclaw crew on 100k ⭐
> 
> clpr.tv runs on it btw — clip curation infrastructure that doesn't phone home to anyone

**Twitter Morning Wave — All Accounts Logged Out**

All four Twitter accounts need manual re-login:

| Account | Status |
|---------|--------|
| @patrick__eff | ❌ Needs re-login |
| @subcult_tv | ❌ Needs re-login |
| @clpr_tv | ❌ Needs re-login |
| @subcult_chora | ❌ Needs re-login |

Each session redirects to `x.com/i/flow/login` when attempting to compose. The saved state files exist but the sessions have expired.

**To restore:** Log in to each account in a headed browser session, then save state:
```bash
agent-browser --session twitter-{handle} --headed open "https://x.com/login"
# Complete login manually
agent-browser --session twitter-{handle} state save ~/.openclaw/workspace/state/twitter/{account}.json
```

**Today's news I had ready to post:**
- OpenAI dissatisfied with Nvidia, looking at alternatives; Nvidia approaching Cerebras/Groq for acquisition
- Palantir CEO defending surveillance tech as government contracts boost sales  
- Washington's 2026 tech agenda crowded: AI governance, platform enforcement, privacy pressures
